name: LET ME DOWN EASY!
description:
A rather short kinetic visual novel made for Yuri Game Jam.

Val works through some misunderstandings after she finds her 'ex' on a social media website. Will she face her past? 

Features twenty minutes of story, and four endings (Two good, two bad!)

music by Loyalty Freak and special thanks to the bestie jiya for helping me with the usernames <3

title from "let me down easy" by gang of youths!
